root.name: Another Bible
root.description: OverviewAnother Bible is a turn based strategy game that was developed by Dice Co. (unrelated to DICE, the Battlefield developer) and published by Atlus for the Game Boy in Japan.Demon CompendiumDemons in Another Bible are not ordered by levels but by ranks, with rank 1 the lowest and up to rank 4 as the highest. At 27 units, Another Bible also has one of the lowest counts of demons in the Megami Tensei series.BeastUnicornChimeraCerberusFenrirAnthro (獣人)WeredogWerewolfWeretigerToukiOgreRakshasaYaksaAvianPegasusGryphonGarudaWyrm (飛龍)WyvernQuetzalcoatlAnantaFairyAlpTrollJinnOberonTyrantLokiPazuzuAsuraLuciferDeityThorTake-MikazuchiShiva

similar_games.game: Fire Emblem: Ankoku Ryu to Hikari no Tsurugi
